name: jolly-roger

scripts.template-test: pnpm --filter ./contracts local_node & pnpm run --filter ./contracts deploy localhost ~~ pnpm export -n localhost --ts ../indexer/src/contracts.ts,../web/src/data/contracts.ts ~~ && pnpm run --filter ./common build && pnpm --filter ./indexer build
scripts._contracts:deploy: pnpm run --filter ./contracts deploy $MODE  ~~ pnpm run export -n $MODE  --ts ../indexer/src/contracts.ts,../web/src/data/contracts.ts ~~
scripts.attach: ldenv -m localhost pnpm --filter ./contracts export -n @@MODE --ts ../indexer/src/contracts.ts,../web/src/data/contracts.ts ~~ pnpm run zellij-attach ~~ @@
scripts.build: ldenv -m sepolia pnpm run --filter ./contracts export -n @@MODE --ts ../indexer/src/contracts.ts,../web/src/data/contracts.ts ~~ pnpm run --filter ./common build ~~ pnpm run --filter ./indexer build ~~ pnpm run --filter ./web build ~~ @@
scripts.contracts:deploy:prepare: ldenv -m localhost ask-env -f contracts/.env.local ETH_NODE_URI_@@MODE MNEMONIC_@@MODE ETHERSCAN_API_KEY:?:ETHERSCAN_API_KEY @@
